message.on_death: §6DogReborn:§r Be careful! Your dog only have %s lives! %s may help you with this. %s, %s, %s
message.on_interact: §6DogReborn:§r Can't add more lives to this doggy! Max: %s
message.on_tame: §6DogReborn:§r Congrats! You now have a new puppy! Consider giving it a %s so he can live longer!
